Class PopupAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.MenuElement

    public class PopupAgent
extends javax.swing.JPopupMenu
    This is the PopupMenu that will appear if the user click on the canvas of agents.
    See Also:
    PopupMessage, Serialized Form
